a.title: Ramapo Indian Hills Continuity of Learning Plan

div.a: READ MORE about Ramapo Indian Hills Continuity of Learning Plan

div.style: orphans: auto; text-align: left; widows: auto;
div.span: Both Ramapo and Indian Hills High Schools will be closedstarting Monday, March 16th until further notice.Continuity of Learning and District Operations in aVirtual Environment

All borough properties will be limited to walking, jogging and exercising in groups of 3 or less. Ball fields, basketball courts, public open spaces and playgroundsare not to be utilized. Further information regarding the Statewide Stay at Home Order can be found using the NJ COVID-19 Information Hubhttps://covid19.nj.gov/
